name: Slipka's Letter Opener
flavorText: Thieves have whispered for centuries of the Grand Vizier Slipka, who could use his letter opener to gut three men, pick two locks, and open the mail, all in the time it took most men to draw their clumsy daggers.
flavorTextHtml: Thieves have whispered for centuries of the Grand Vizier Slipka, who could use his letter opener to gut three men, pick two locks, and open the mail, all in the time it took most men to draw their clumsy daggers.

secondary.textHtml: Equip on Follower: Reduce the cooldown of all Follower skills by 50%.
secondary.text: Equip on Follower: Reduce the cooldown of all Follower skills by 50%.
